It's crazy that I keep hearing calls for the Diamondback to be remade - We designed that 10 years ago!
Anyone else vote for this? https://t.co/oZKeexjZfd
@Hescarz Then don't buy it - we've got lots of awesome mousepads.
@SK_ShaIom That was one of the designs but it made the entire mousepad a little too ungainly.
When one of the designers came up with the Firefly, we pooh poohed him until we realized we all wanted one but were too ashamed to say it.
@AsuraRyu Why not? It's got one of the best surfaces in the world for tracking.
I actually hope we don't ever lose that. It's how the first gaming mouse in the world, the Blade and now the Firefly actually came to life.
The way things are designed at @Razer boil down to: "Would I as a gamer want this?" If it's a yes - we go ahead ignoring everything else.
